features: Claw attack: victim must succeed on a DC10 Wis
saving throw or take 2d4 poison damage and
become poisoned for 1 min. The target can repeat
the saving throw at the end of each of its turns,
ending the effect on itself on a success.
Move: Walk, Fly, Climb & Swim
Resistant to cold, fire, lightning
Resistant to B/P/S from non-magic weapons
Immune to poison, poisoned
Darkvision 120'
Shapechange (Bat, Centipede, Toad)
Magic Resistance (adv vs spells & magical effects)
Scare (1/day). One creature of Gizmo's choice within
20' of it must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving
throw or be frightened for 1 min. The target can
repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its
turns, with disadvantage if Gizmo is in line of sight,
ending the effect on itself on a success.
Invisibility. Gizmo magically turns invisible until it
attacks of uses Scare, or until its concentration
ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any
equipment Gizmo wears or carries is invisible with
it.
Telepathic bond: Talos can sense what Gizmo
senses if he is within 1 mile.
Gizmo shares his magic resistance with Talos if they
are within 10'
